item.Q:
Write the character:
to establish; to found; to set up; to build; to construct
item.A:
jiàn
建设 (建設) jiànshè to build; to construct; construction; constructive

item.Q:

item.A:
gǎi
改变 (改變) gǎibiàn to change; to alter; to transform

item.Q:
Write the character:
surname Lian; even; as; join; to link; successively
item.A:
连 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 連
lián
连续 (連續) liánxù continuous; in a row

item.Q:
Write the character:
to release; to free; to let go; to put; to place; to let out
item.A:
fàng
解放 jiěfàng to liberate; to emancipate; liberation

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: laughter; yawn; abbr. for Kazakhstan
2: a Pekinese; a pug
item.A:
1: hā 2: hǎ
哈哈 hāhā (an onomatopoeia for laughing) 哈吉 hǎjí hadji (one who has made the pilgrimage to Mecca)

item.Q:
Write the character: shè
(jiànshè de shè)
item.A:
traditional: 設
to set up; to arrange; to establish; to found; to display
建设 (建設) jiànshè to build; to construct; construction; constructive
jiànjiāo to establish diplomatic relations

traditional: 建國
jiànguó to found a country; nation-building; the foundation of PRC by Mao Zedong in 1949
jiànchéng establish; build
jiànlì creation; set up; construction; build; establish; set up

Xīnjiàn (N) Xinjian (place in Jiangxi)
xīnjiàn newly established
chóngjiàn reconstruction; rebuilding

traditional: 改動
gǎidòng to change
gǎijiàn (v) rebuild
gǎizhèng to correct; to amend; to put right; correction

traditional: 改進
gǎijìn to improve; to make better

traditional: 改過
gǎiguò to correct; to fix

traditional: 改選
gǎixuǎn reelection; to reelect

gènggǎi alter
gēnggǎi alter

traditional: 一連
yīlián in a row; in succession; running

traditional: 大連
Dàlián Dalian, prefecture level city in Liaoning
dàlián Dalian

traditional: 接二連三
jiēèrliánsān (saying) one right after another

traditional: 接連
jiēlián on end; in a row; in succession

traditional: 相連
xiānglián to link; to join; link; connection

traditional: 連同
liántóng together with; along with

traditional: 連天
liántiān for days in succession

traditional: 連年
liánnián successive years; over many years

traditional: 連接
liánjiē to link; to join; to attach; connection; a link (on web page)

traditional: 連日
liánrì day after day; for several days running

traditional: 連用
liányòng to continue using; use together with sth; use next

traditional: 連通
liántōng to connect; to communicate; to relate

traditional: 連連
liánlián repeatedly; again and again
xìafàng (v) get transferred to a lower job position; demoted; (v) transfer a cadre to the factory or countryside to work

fàngxia lay down; put down; let go; release
fàngxìa plop
fàngchū to let off; to give out
fàngdà enlarge

traditional: 放學
fàngxué classes are over
fàngxīn to set one's mind at rest; to be at ease; to rest
fàngshǒu let go; have a free hand; let go one's hold

traditional: 放電
fàngdiàn electrical discharge

traditional: 發放
fāfàng provide; give; grant
jiěfàng to liberate; to emancipate; liberation

traditional: 解放區
jiěfàngqū liberated area

traditional: 開放
kāifàng to lift (restrictions); to open; to make open to the public; to lift a ban; to unfurl; to bloom
hāhā (an onomatopoeia for laughing)
kuàihuo gay, happy
huólì energy; vitality

traditional: 活動
huódòng activity; exercise; behavior

traditional: 活動家
huódòngjīa political activist
huózǐ movable type
huóxìng liveness
huóshēngshēng (adv) while still alive

traditional: 活結
huójié a slip-knot; a noose

traditional: 活該
huógāi (coll.) serve sb right; deservedly; ought; should
shēnghuó life; activity; to live

traditional: 生活區
shēnghuóqū living region
shēnghuófāngshì way of life; lifestyle

traditional: 過活
guòhuó live one's life; make a living
zhònghuó taskwork
kēyán (scientific) research
kēyánchéngguǒ research results

yìzhí continuous
yīzhí straight (in a straight line); continuously; always; from the beginning of ... up to ...; all along; always
zhèngzhí upright; upstanding; honest
zhídào until
zhíjiē direct (opposite of indirect); immediate; directly; straightforward
zhízhì lasting until; up till (the present)

traditional: 直覺
zhíjué intuition

traditional: 公設
gōngshè (logic) a postulate

traditional: 分設
fēnshè to establish separate units

traditional: 工程設計
gōngchéngshèjì project design

traditional: 建設
jiànshè to build; to construct; construction; constructive

traditional: 建設性
jiànshèxìng constructive; constructiveness

traditional: 想方設法
xiǎngfāngshèfǎ (saying) to think of or try every possible method to do sth

traditional: 設想
shèxiǎng imagine; assume; tentative plan

traditional: 設法
shèfǎ try; think of a way (to accomplish something)

traditional: 設立
shèlì to set up; to establish

traditional: 設計
shèjì plan; design; to design; to plan

traditional: 開設
kāishè offer (goods or services); open (for business etc)
